channel.title: Samples don’t appear
channel.description:
Ok, I have a couple samples, wav files, five seconds each, I export them to the Auxy folder in iCloud, I’ve checked the samples folder and they’re definitely in there, but no matter what I do when I open the iCloud in Auxy to load samples into an empty drum kit, they’re not there.
I tried closing and reopening the project, still not there. I have many samples and successfully loaded in the past, first time I’ve had this problem. Any idea why?

item.title: Samples don’t appear
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Hmm not sure if you haven’t already, probably the best way to get answers to these types of questions is to contact feedback@auxy.co

Read full topic

item.title: Samples don’t appear
item.dc:creator: GioMakyo
item.description:
Ok, I have a couple samples, wav files, five seconds each, I export them to the Auxy folder in iCloud, I’ve checked the samples folder and they’re definitely in there, but no matter what I do when I open the iCloud in Auxy to load samples into an empty drum kit, they’re not there.

I tried closing and reopening the project, still not there. I have many samples and successfully loaded in the past, first time I’ve had this problem. Any idea why?
